title: Hurricanes vs Crusaders
plot: A thrilling encounter between the Hurricanes and Crusaders at Sky Stadium in Wellington. Kick-off: 7:05 PM NZT.

title: Waratahs vs Chiefs
plot: The Waratahs host the Chiefs at Allianz Stadium in Sydney. Kick-off: 9:35 PM NZT.

title: Blues vs Moana Pasifika
plot: The Blues take on Moana Pasifika at Eden Park in Auckland. Kick-off: 4:35 PM NZT.

title: Highlanders vs Fijian Drua
plot: An exciting matchup between the Highlanders and Fijian Drua at Forsyth Barr Stadium in Dunedin. Kick-off: 7:05 PM NZT.

title: Reds vs Brumbies
plot: The Reds face the Brumbies at Suncorp Stadium in Brisbane. Kick-off: 9:35 PM NZT.
